info.title: British Airways Hotel and More Offers
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs. Provide hotel and more offers information.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Method to retrieve information about the hotel usi...
get.description: Method to retrieve information about the hotel using below params

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: An ISO 2 character country code

parameters.name: cityCode
parameters.description: An IATA 3 character airport or city code

parameters.name: checkInDate
parameters.description: A date in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ

parameters.name: checkOutDate
parameters.description: A date in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: mime type
